attributes.action: end the scandalous discrimination against social security pensioners living in some countries.   They ask no more than contributed-related pensions in line with pensioners in the UK and some thirty other countries in the world.    No more than a change in the Regulations is required toredress this inequity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These disadvantaged pensioners are not seeking special treatment.   We are seeking equal treatment.   No more!   No less!

High regard for fair play was once a hallmark worldwide of British character.   
Has the collective conscience of the electorate as represented in Parliament so diminished as to feel no shame?

In terms of fair play, natural justice, logic, humanity or indeed on any other such account, this discrimination cannot in all conscience be acceptable in a civilised society.
